header.presentAlt: Drawing of a person with black hair and a blue shirt on a green background

textsInicial: A Senior Software developer on the journey of becoming a great leader.
I have about 5 years of experience in the Information Technology area, with a graduation in Computer Engineering, PSM 1, AWS, and DevOps certifications, and a postgraduate degree in Data Science.
textsFinal: Currently, I'm developing solutions using mainly JavaScript, Node, React, C#, and SQL. Using the AWS cloud structure and also different on-premises infrastructures. I have experience working with agile methodologies, code versioning tools, unit testing, and docker.

The kind of person who always seeks to work together with the team and other colleagues, optimizing processes, disseminating knowledge, constantly seeking to be up to date, and learning new things to improve everything possible more and more.

I have abilities in managing project schedules, monitoring deadlines, and resources, and collaborating with internal and external stakeholders to identify requirements and expectations, ensuring the delivery of high-quality solutions.

skills.title: Skills & Tools
skills.text: Some languages and tools I use or have used

timeline.title: Senior Software Developer
description: Responsible for monitoring, estimating, planning, developing, and implementing several projects for different large companies in the telecommunications, financial market services, retail insurance, credit, and government sectors.
Full cycle development, participating in requirements gathering, development, testing, deployment, and monitoring of production services.
Development of solutions and business rules implementation using mainly JavaScript, Node, .NET, AWS cloud structure, MySQL, SQL Server, and Oracle.
Skills: JavaScript, Node.js, C#, TypeScript, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Delphi, Powershell, Microsoft Excel.

timeline.title: IT Internship
description: Managing and preparing purchases for the area, controlling executive phone lines, support in the survey and dimensioning of IT infrastructure, development of macros in Excel for for automating and improving business processes.
Customizing elements of the Microsoft Dynamics CRM platform and development of applications in Microsoft Sharepoint.
Skills: Microsoft Excel, Visual Basic for Applications (VBA).

timeline.title: Internship in Web Development - Front-end
description: Development of websites and web systems, with Front-end using HTML5, CSS3 (SASS) and JavaScript (React), with responsive design based on the Bootstrap framework, and using good practice methods such as RSCSS and ITCSS.
Skills: Web Development, HTML, CSS, JavaScript.

timeline.title: IT Internship
description: Maintenance and access control. Promotion of information, training users through the integration of access to information through digital technologies.
